forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 1 to 15 mph.

weather_report:
In the crisp morning light of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle breeze stirs the night’s remnants, lending an air of serenity to the scene. The city lies mostly clear under a soft, burgeoning sky as night yields to day, boasting a tranquil low of about fifty-two. As the sun tips over the horizon, its golden rays hint at a revealed beauty, encouraging a moment of quiet reflection before bustling activity takes over.

Today promises sunshine, inviting temperatures reaching up to sixty-seven mid-morning, then settling closer to sixty-four by afternoon. A delicate northwest wind carries a touch of the bay’s salt-kissed air, ensuring the warmth remains pleasant without becoming stifling. Ideal attire might include a light sweater or long-sleeved shirt; this layered approach allows for easy adjustments as the day unfolds. With clarity reigning, one might explore the picturesque waterfront or meander through the hidden paths of Golden Gate Park, where the merging hues of autumn illuminate a canvas alive with color. Or perhaps a leisurely visit to a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the scent of pastries, will beckon before the day unfolds in all its San Francisco glory.
